Key Match Events: The Hawks pulled away for good with a 14-0 run in the middle of the fourth quarter that made it 116-97.
Pre-Game Insights: Zion Williamson was scratched from the lineup with right hamstring tightness shortly before the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Brandon Ingram scored 32, but it wasn't enough to overcome a Hawks squad with six players with at least 11 points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hawks played without starter Deâ€™Andre Hunter, plus rotation players Bogdan Bogdanovic, Vit Krejci and Kobe Bufkin due to injury.
Others: Jordan Hawkins scored 19 points for the Pelicans as a fill-in starter.
